title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Four (4) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of Biology, Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Animal Husbandry, Health Science, Economics, Integrated/Rural Science, Nature Study,  General Science and at least a pass in Chemistry is compulsory OR four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: Any three of Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Biology, Economics, Geography and Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGY/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Four (4) SSCE/ GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Geography, General Science, Agricultural Science OR Four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: Any three of Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Mathematics and Agricultural Science.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
Four (4) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of Economics, Principles of Account/Book-Keeping, Business Method/Introduction to Business Management, Office Practice/Secretarial Duties, Shorthand, Typewriting and Commerce.


WAEC Commercial or National Secretarial Examination (NSA)or RSA stage II Certificate with  credit/merit passes in at least four subjects


OR four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: Any three of Mathematics, Economics, Government, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

title: CHEMISTRY/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Four (4) SCCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of Chemistry, Biology, Physics, Geography, General Science, Agricultural Science or four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subjects listed above.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Biology, Physics, General Science, Geography, Mathematics and Agricultural Science.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Four (4) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and any one of Biology, Physics, Geography, General Science, Computer Studies, Data Processing OR Four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and any of Physics, Biology and Geography

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Four (4) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, and any one of Biology, Chemistry, Geography, Data Processing, Computer Studies OR Four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Four (4) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of Physics, Biology, Chemistry, Geography, Data Processing, Computer Studies OR four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Four (4) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two of Biology, Chemistry, Geography, Data Processing, Computer Studies OR Four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: FINE & APPLIED ART (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Four (4) SCCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of Arts, Social  Science and Sciences eg Literature, CRK, Visual Art, History, Economics, Accounts, Commerce, Government, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and any related subject or four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subjects listed above.

title: HOME ECONOMICS (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Four (4) SCCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of Chemistry, Biology, Physics, Geography, General Science, Agricultural Science, Health Science, Home Management/Hotel and Catering, Food and Nutrition, Integrated Science, PHE/PE, Economics, Men/Ladies Garment, Men/Ladies Textile Design, Spinning, Weaving, Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing OR four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subjects listed above.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Biology, Agricultural Science, Home Economics, Economics and Mathematics.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE / MATHEMATICS EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Four (4) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of Biology, Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, Geography, General Science OR four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of: Biology, Physics, Geography and Chemistry.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Four (4) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any one of Biology, Chemistry, Geography OR four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: Physics and any other  two of Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Geography

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES
utme_requirements: Four (4) SSCE/ GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two subjects OR Four (4) TC II merit/credit passes in English, Mathematics and any two of the relevant subject listed above
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: TECHNICAL EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Four (4)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any two of Technical Drawing, Physics, Chemistry, Geography, applied Electricity, Basic Electronics, Auto Mechanics, Woodwork, Metal work, Biology, Building Construction OR four (4) TC II Merit/Credit passes in English, Mathematics and two of the relevant subjects listed above.
subjects: Any three (3) of Physics, Chemistry, General Science, Technical Drawing, Mathematics and Geography.
